scenario_text.value: Oh, Takuma. Hi.

Don’t tell me you’re lazing around?
Are you ready to leave?
Oops! Not yet.

So you’re just out on a walk? Must be nice to
have all that spare time.

Why are you fooling around NOW?
Can’t you take this seriously?

If you’ve got time to wander around, you
should finish getting ready.
(Oof. Totally got yelled at.)

(I want to see how everyone is doing.
But you have to walk around to do that.)

(Maybe I’m just nervous. Seeing their faces
is reassuring...)

(Will I feel better if I talk to them? I hope
I’m not leaning on them too much.)
(Should I talk to them?)
I’m actually nervous.
How’s everyone doing?
Just looking around.
I’m actually nervous.

I must be nervous before the fighting.
I just started walking around.
Really? You get nervous too?

Do not judge him so harshly.
Takuma is a human child too, after all.

Just relax.
This battle’s not that big a deal.

We walk to the base, and if the enemy comes
at us, we defeat them. Simple, right?
Do some stretches. Get the tension out.
(Huh. They’re kinder to me than I thought.)

Thanks, everyone. I’ll stretch and then start
getting ready.
How’s everyone doing?

I was wondering how everyone was doing before
the battle. I wanted to see your faces.
Snooping around just like always, huh.

Now, now. I’m sure Takuma had good
intentions.

Don’t be so harsh on him.
Right, Dracmon?

You’re right. We shouldn’t take it out on him
just because we’re nervous.
The silent treatment?!

Our apologies for having worried you, Takuma.
We are fine.

Okay. I’ll keep looking around a bit more,
and then finish getting ready.
Just looking around.

I just wanted to look around.
I had some free time on my hands.
Must be nice.

Now, now, it might be important.
A walk before a battle calms your nerves.

It is important to stay calm.
Minoru, you can learn from Takuma.
Don’t drag me into this!

No matter what, you need to get ready too.
No excuse for oversleeping AND lateness.
Okay, okay.
Go and get ready now!
We’re leaving as soon as we finish breakfast!
